channel.title: Idea for cannon! (need someone to code for me... =p )
channel.description: ok, my idea is when you click "fire" on a cannon, its brings up an interface with a list of npcs within about 15 spaces of you. you click on the name of the npc you wanna shot and it hits the npc! but i have somewhat of an idea how to do it, but i couldnt do it if i tried. could someone come up with it and show me? or is this not even possible?

item.title: Idea for cannon! (need someone to code for me... =p )
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:4, topic:59917”]You want people to make your idea? Thats like saying ‘all these other games suck so I’ll make my own game’ then you start writing letters to game makers to make your game because ‘it pones’

PFft.[/quote]
Lmao “Poned”[br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2007, 06:49:01 PM[/size][hr]I think you could do it by modifying this tut : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,50481.0.html that’s the tut for making cannon shoot you to places. But not sure how

item.title: Idea for cannon! (need someone to code for me... =p )
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

I guess you can do something where the closest npcs would be listed in your quest menu or something, but thats it. You cant make an interface because it is not in the cache files. Well, you can use a interface that is used for something else. I would tell you that the bank pin interface is best for this.

If anyone knows the id for the bank pin interface, I would be glad to program this for your server and for mine.

[size=8pt]AOL Instant message me with your response.[/size]

Read full topic
